message: Let's start with a simple offer, Bob. I take $6,000, you take $4,000. A fair deal considering I get to propose first.
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's make it snappy. Time is money!
Bob, time is money, but so is fairness.  I'll meet you in the middle from our previous offers. This is my final offer.
Alice, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
